overview: A sea captain about to be hanged for a murder he didn't commit is rescued from the gallows by two of his crewmen. They head for the island of Pulinan, where they believe the real murderer--the captain's former partner--is hiding so the captain can clear his name. As it turns out, their troubles are only beginning
tagline: SEE bold daredevils defy the evil that plagues HAUNTED HARBOR!
title: Haunted Harbor
